text: Victoria Azarenka (, ; born 31 July 1989) is a Belarusian tennis player. She won the mixed doubles at the 2007 US Open and at the 2008 French Open. She won the singles at the 2012 and 2013 Australian Open. At the 2012 Summer Olympics, she won a bronze medal in the singles and a gold medal in the mixed doubles. She is a former world number 1. As of 8 July 2013, she was the world number 3. She was born in Minsk and lives in Monte Carlo, Monaco.WTA profile == References == == Other websites == *Official website Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Australian Open champions Category:Belarusian tennis players Category:Female tennis players Category:Olympic bronze medalists Category:Olympic gold medalists Category:World No. 1 tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Minsk Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic medalists for Belarus
title: Victoria Azarenka
